verses.text: And \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*,
No \w doubt|strong="H0551"\w* but ye \add are\add* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* with you.

\w But|strong="H1571"\w* I have \w understanding|strong="H3824"\w* as well as you; I \add am\add* not \w inferior|strong="H5307"\w* to you: yea, who knoweth not such \w things|strong="H3644"\w* as these?\f + \fr 12.3 \ft understanding: Heb. an heart\f*\f + \fr 12.3 \ft I am…: Heb. I fall not lower than you\f*\f + \fr 12.3 \ft who…: Heb. with whom are not such as these?\f*

I am \add as\add* one \w mocked|strong="H7814"\w* of his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, who \w calleth|strong="H7121"\w* upon \w God|strong="H0433"\w*, and he \w answereth|strong="H6030"\w* him: the \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w upright|strong="H8549"\w* \add man is\add* laughed to \w scorn|strong="H7814"\w*.

He that is \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* to \w slip|strong="H4571"\w* with \add his\add* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \add is as\add* a \w lamp|strong="H3940"\w* \w despised|strong="H0937"\w* in the \w thought|strong="H6248"\w* of him that is at \w ease|strong="H7600"\w*.

The \w tabernacles|strong="H0168"\w* of \w robbers|strong="H7703"\w* \w prosper|strong="H7951"\w*, and they that \w provoke|strong="H7264"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* are \w secure|strong="H0987"\w*; into whose \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* \w bringeth|strong="H0935"\w* \add abundantly\add*.

\w But|strong="H0199"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* now the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, and they shall \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* thee; and the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w air|strong="H8064"\w*, and they shall \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* thee:

Or \w speak|strong="H7878"\w* to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and it shall \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* thee: and the \w fishes|strong="H1709"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* shall \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* unto thee.
Who \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* not in all these that the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* this?

In whose \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add is\add* the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of every living \w thing|strong="H2416"\w*, and the \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* of all \w mankind|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 12.10 \ft soul: or, life\f*\f + \fr 12.10 \ft all…: Heb. all flesh of man\f*

Doth not the \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* \w try|strong="H0974"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w*? and the \w mouth|strong="H2441"\w* \w taste|strong="H2938"\w* his \w meat|strong="H0400"\w*?\f + \fr 12.11 \ft mouth: Heb. palate\f*
With the \w ancient|strong="H3453"\w* \add is\add* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*; and in \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*.

With him \add is\add* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* and \w strength|strong="H1369"\w*, he hath \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* and \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*.\f + \fr 12.13 \ft With…: that is, With God\f*

Behold, he breaketh \w down|strong="H2040"\w*, and it cannot be built \w again|strong="H1129"\w*: he shutteth \w up|strong="H5462"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and there can be no \w opening|strong="H6605"\w*.\f + \fr 12.14 \ft up: Heb. upon\f*

Behold, he \w withholdeth|strong="H6113"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, and they dry \w up|strong="H3001"\w*: also he sendeth them \w out|strong="H7971"\w*, and they \w overturn|strong="H2015"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
With him \add is\add* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* and \w wisdom|strong="H8454"\w*: the \w deceived|strong="H7683"\w* and the \w deceiver|strong="H7686"\w* \add are\add* his.
He \w leadeth|strong="H3212"\w* \w counsellors|strong="H3289"\w* away \w spoiled|strong="H7758"\w*, and maketh the \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w fools|strong="H1984"\w*.
He \w looseth|strong="H6605"\w* the \w bond|strong="H4148"\w* of \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, and \w girdeth|strong="H0631"\w* their \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* with a \w girdle|strong="H0232"\w*.
He \w leadeth|strong="H3212"\w* \w princes|strong="H3548"\w* away \w spoiled|strong="H7758"\w*, and \w overthroweth|strong="H5557"\w* the \w mighty|strong="H0386"\w*.

He removeth \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w speech|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w trusty|strong="H0539"\w*, and taketh \w away|strong="H3947"\w* the \w understanding|strong="H2940"\w* of the \w aged|strong="H2205"\w*.\f + \fr 12.20 \ft speech…: Heb. lip of the faithful\f*

He \w poureth|strong="H8210"\w* \w contempt|strong="H0937"\w* upon \w princes|strong="H5081"\w*, and \w weakeneth|strong="H7503"\w* the \w strength|strong="H4206"\w* of the \w mighty|strong="H0650"\w*.\f + \fr 12.21 \ft weakeneth…: or, looseth the girdle of the strong\f*

He \w discovereth|strong="H1540"\w* deep \w things|strong="H6013"\w* out of \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, and bringeth \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w light|strong="H0216"\w* the shadow of \w death|strong="H6757"\w*.

He \w increaseth|strong="H7679"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w destroyeth|strong="H0006"\w* them: he \w enlargeth|strong="H7849"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w straiteneth|strong="H5148"\w* them \add again\add*.\f + \fr 12.23 \ft straiteneth: Heb. leadeth in\f*

He taketh \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and causeth them to \w wander|strong="H8582"\w* in a \w wilderness|strong="H8414"\w* \add where there is\add* no \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

They \w grope|strong="H4959"\w* in the \w dark|strong="H2822"\w* without \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, and he maketh them to \w stagger|strong="H8582"\w* like \add a\add* \w drunken|strong="H7910"\w* \add man\add*.\f + \fr 12.25 \ft stagger: Heb. wander\f*
